posts.post_content:
I recently purchased a large lot of 1980’s postcards of early
1900’s players.  They appear to be images taken from photos and books.  I think they were made by Jim Rowe or George Brace.  The image quality isn’t great, but it looks like someone wanted a postcard of every player who ever played during this era.  Is anyone interested?  If so, email me at [url]nortonnerd@msn.com[/url] for images.  Thank you.
